name: Imperial Decree
text:
DECISIONS and DECLARATIONS
of
EMPEROR URIEL SEPTIM VII
and his loyal servants in
THE ELDER COUNCIL
no. 678 8765 121, 3E 426


[This pamphlet is a listing of last year's notable Imperial declarations. Most of it involves taxation, trade law, and censored literature. About a third of the pamphlet consists of formal condemnations of various provincial rebellions.]
